title: Real Estate Virtual Assistant – Social Media & Marketing (33 hrs/month, more depending on VA ability)
job_overview:
We’re looking for a proactive, creative, and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to support marketing and outreach for two real estate-related brands:
- A fast-growing real estate media company in San Antonio, Texas
- A real estate support & property services division helping landlords and investors

This role is perfect for you if you:

Have experience working with Realtors, property managers, or real estate brokerages.
Special bonus if you have experience working with Real Estate Photography or Media companies!.
Have strong graphic design and social media skills (Canva, Reels, carousels, captions)
Are experienced in scheduling tools (we use Later) and email platforms (like GetResponse)
Love organizing tasks and posting consistently across multiple platforms
Know how to write DUpgrade to see actual infossages and connect with potential clients (agents, property managers)
Understand how to repurpose content across platforms without reinventing the wheel

What you’ll do:

Create & schedule social media posts across platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, Pinterest, Threads, LinkedIn)
Help write short email newsletters and basic email flows (no tech-heavy automation)
Research and message potential leads (templates and direction provided)
Provide weekly updates on content performance, outreach, and next steps
Update bios or link-in-bio pages across platforms to reflect branding and services

Tools You’ll Use (Provided):

Canva Pro
Later (scheduler)
CapCut or similar (for occasional short-form video)
GetResponse (email platform)

Details:
Part-time – 33 hours/month (more depending on VA capability)
Flexible working hours
Weekly Zoom check-in (30 mins)
Long-term opportunity for the right fit
Pay: $300/month (with potential for bonuses if results are strong)

How to Apply:
Send the following:

Your resume or portfolio (include links to IG/TikTok pages you manage if available)
One paragraph about your real estate expertise and why this role is a good fit for you 
A reel or carousel post you’ve created (Canva or CapCut welcome)
Your timezone and availability

Let’s grow together!
